data.eml:eml: New species, redescriptions and phylogenetic revision of tribe Dacini (Diptera: Tephritidae: Dacinae) from India based on morphological characters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article David, K. J., Ramani, S. (2019): New species, redescriptions and phylogenetic revision of tribe Dacini (Diptera: Tephritidae: Dacinae) from India based on morphological characters. Zootaxa 4551 (2): 101-146, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4551.2.1
